fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Culture and media, Budget, Competition, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
R&I policies (H2020, Horizon Europe) 
Related policy domains (from the R&I perspective) such as energy, mobility, climate, ICT etc.
organisation_name: The Joint Institute for Innovation Policy (JIIP)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
source: DG RTD, DG CNECT, DG MOVE, DG GROW
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: ALLAN#Jacqueline E  M  , CHICOT#Julien, DOMINI#Alberto, ESPADA SUAREZ#Juan Carlos, FEDERICI#Lia, FISHER#Robbert
goals__remit: JIIP is a collaboration between four RTO's TNO, Tecnalia, VTT and Joanneum Research. It is a Think Tank in the field of research and innovation policy. the goal of JIIP is to support policy making organisations in the EU to improve these policies, both for the public benefit as for the stakeholders.

Open Innovation and Knowledge Transfer (DG RTD ingoing) 
Science2Society (H2020) 
ScienceDiplomacy (H2020) 
Evaluation of the database directive (DG CNECT 2018) 
Smart Urban Mobility support (DG MOVE ongoing) 
many other studies for DG RTD, DG CNECT, DG GROW, DG MOVE in particualr
